targets.expr: sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{job="kube-state-metrics", namespace=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", deployment="gitlab-mr-wh"}) by (deployment) / sum(kube_deployment_spec_replicas{job="kube-state-metrics", namespace="gitlab-mr-wh", deployment="gitlab-mr-wh"}) by (deployment)

sum(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", pod=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", container="gitlab-mr-wh"}[5m])) by (pod, container)
/ 
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{namespace=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", pod=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", container="gitlab-mr-wh"}) by (pod, container)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", pod=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", container="gitlab-mr-wh"}) by (pod, container) 
/ 
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", pod=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", container="gitlab-mr-wh"}) by (pod, container)
